page.title: 08Social Concerns
page.content: There are only five items which are of concern to people in our area. 1.Most people think that the traffic will be impossible when the visitors come to the country club at Kingsdown. 2.People think a one_way system in Upper St would be convenient. 3.The villagers are pleased that a school is being built at Kingsdown in 1986. 4.People would like more seats for elderly people in Kingsdown. 5.Many people are concerned about the new houses going up.They like the village as it is. Most people think the village has a social centre.Visitors and local people find the village is very friendly.People have friends in and out of the village.
